item.title: 2017 Devops Conferences
item.description: Hat-tip to Sarah Drasner who came up with a list of 2017 Front-end conferences that inspired this list. If I have missed any, please tweet me at @matrixtek and Iâ€™ll review it being added to the list. Note: There is a larger list over here that lists a number of the smaller conferences January None listed February Devops Days Charlotte March Devops Days Baltimore Devops Days Vancouver Elasticon 2017 SRECon17 Americas Strata + Hadoop World 2017 April Devops Days Atlanta Devops Days Seattle May ApacheCon Devops Days Austin Devops Days Salt Lake City Devops Days Toronto Devops Days Zurich Monitorama PyCon17 US SRECon17 Asia/ Australia June Devops Days Amsterdam Velocity San Jose July Devops Days Minneapolis GopherCon August SRECon17 Europe/ Middle East/ Africa September Devops Days Detroit October LISA17 Velocity London Velocity New York November None listed December None listed No Date Listed SaltConf Couchbase Connect 17
